SEARCH
Package com.tecton.ingestclient.client

Class TectonHttpClient

java.lang.Object
com.tecton.ingestclient.client.TectonHttpClient
public class TectonHttpClient extends Object
A client for sending HTTP requests to the Tecton API.

Provides mechanisms to construct and send requests to the Tecton API, process the responses, and parse them into appropriate models.

    • TectonHttpClient

      public TectonHttpClient(TectonHttpSinkConnectorConfig config)
      Initialises a new instance of TectonHttpClient.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration object containing details such as the base endpoint of the Tecton API, the API key for authentication, connection timeout, and request timeout.

  • Method Details

    • sendSync

      public TectonApiResponse sendSync(TectonApiRequest requestData) throws org.apache.kafka.connect.errors.ConnectException, org.apache.kafka.connect.errors.RetriableException
      Sends a synchronous request to the Tecton API.
      Parameters:
      requestData - The data to be sent to the Tecton API.
      Returns:
      The response from the Tecton API.
      Throws:
      org.apache.kafka.connect.errors.ConnectException - If there's a non-retriable error from the Tecton API.
      org.apache.kafka.connect.errors.RetriableException - If there's a retriable error.

    • sendAsync

      public CompletableFuture<TectonApiResponse> sendAsync(TectonApiRequest requestData)
      Sends an asynchronous request to the Tecton API.
      Parameters:
      requestData - The data to be sent to the Tecton API.
      Returns:
      A future representing the response from the Tecton API.

    • sendAsyncBatch

      public List<CompletableFuture<TectonApiResponse>> sendAsyncBatch(List<TectonApiRequest> batchRequestData)
      Sends a batch of asynchronous requests to the Tecton API.
      Parameters:
      batchRequestData - A list of data to be sent to the Tecton API.
      Returns:
      A list of futures representing the responses from the Tecton API for each request.
